General.Name: Chongqing Brewery Co Ltd
General.Description: Chongqing Brewery Co., Ltd. produces and sells beers and non-alcoholic beverages in China. It also engages in the production and sale of beer equipment, packages, and raw and auxiliary materials; and general cargo transportation business. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Guangzhou, China.

2.Name: Mr. Wei  Deng
2.Title: Sec. of the Board of Directors
